8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that :the Prophet said: "Whoever does not leave false speech, and acting according to it, then Allah is not in any need of him leaving his food and his drink

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّشْدِيدِ فِي الْغِيبَةِ لِلصَّائِمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Severity Of Back Biting For The Fasting Person
